pullRequest.title: Send notification to the clients after importing projects
pullRequest.bodyText:
require: redhat-developer/vscode-java#1476
Signed-off-by: Sheng Chen sheche@microsoft.com

nodes.bodyText: The event notification is sent from a server to a client to notify the client certain events happened on the server side, eg. classpath was updated, projects were imported
this doesn't include pom projects for instance
I wonder if someone else will be broken by that

beforeCommit.message:
Address the comments
